meta.name: description
meta.content: Founded in 1876, we are a one-school elementary district in Harwood Heights, Illinois. Union Ridge serves 600 students of diverse backgrounds from pre-kindergarten through eighth grade.

a.span: School Closure: Governor Pritzker announced on Friday, April 17th that all schools in Illinois will remain closed for the rest of the 2019-2020 school year. - Students will not return to school for the rest of this school year
